Uses of Interface
solvers.Strategy

  • Packages that use Strategy 
    Package Description
    solvers
    Title: solvers
    The following package holds all classes related to the solvers of the Binary Puzzle Assistant (BPA).

    • Uses of Strategy in solvers

      Classes in solvers that implement Strategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ContradictionStrategy
      A concrete strategy of the Strategy interface, this strategy contains the ability to apply a contradiction strategy to a given cell
      class  LineStrategy
      A concrete strategy of the Strategy interface, this strategy contains the ability to apply a line strategy to a given cell
      class  TripletStrategy
      A concrete strategy of the Strategy interface, this strategy contains the ability to apply a triplet strategy to a given cell
      Method parameters in solvers with type arguments of type Strategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Command DecoratorStrategy.find(Grid grid, java.util.ArrayList<Strategy> strategies)
      Finds an strategy in a list of given strategies to apply to an empty cell
      CompoundCommand RecursiveDecoratorStrategy.find(Grid grid, java.util.ArrayList<Strategy> strategies)
      Finds a strategy in a list of given strategies to apply to an empty cell
